title: Reinstalling and Patching
body:
So i have been playing League of Legends since season 1 and I have uninstalled and reinstalled it. I am patching right now and:
1)The space of my hard drive keeps getting smaller and why?
2)Does playing for a long time like I have make my League of Legends folder bigger?
3) Is it safe to delete the logs folder?

replies.body:
Ayyyyy always nice to see a long time player ^_^!

The space League takes up got a little smaller after the client update since it also got rid of some older unused files. No worries about that. Playing for a long time shouldn't make the folders get much bigger, and if they do it's likely just those log files tbh. On the note of log files, they're just used for troubleshooting if needed. Its good to keep those around, but you should feel free to delete the really old one.
